name: jincana
description: Server App for Facebook Messenger with Wit.ai bot

scripts.release-commit: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "update CHANGELOG"
scripts.release-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release-major: changelog -M && npm run release-commit && npm version major && npm run release-push
scripts.release-minor: changelog -m && npm run release-commit && npm version minor && npm run release-push
scripts.release-patch: changelog -p && npm run release-commit && npm version patch && npm run release-push

author: Charles Araya
